ACKLEY.reference: @book{ackley2012connectionist,title={A connectionist machine for genetic hillclimbing},author={Ackley, David},volume={28},year={2012},publisher={Springer Science & Business Media}}
ACKLEY.summary: Non-convex and multimodal. Clear global minimum at the center surrounded by many symmetrical local minima. Use three parameters a, b and c.
